cluster_relations.rel_desc: The egg stage occurs before and develops into the larval (caterpillar) stage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that one biological life-cycle stage temporally precedes and developmentally leads into another stage within the same organism's life cycle.
remarks: Also implicitly indicates developmental transition, not just ordering.
Also implicitly indicates developmental transition, not just ordering.
Also implicitly indicates developmental transition, not just ordering.
Also implicitly indicates developmental transition, not just ordering.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The larval (caterpillar) stage occurs before and develops into the pupa stage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that one biological life-cycle stage temporally precedes and developmentally leads into another stage within the same organism's life cycle.
remarks: Developmental transition implied though not fully elaborated.
Developmental transition implied though not fully elaborated.
Developmental transition implied though not fully elaborated.
Developmental transition implied though not fully elaborated.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The pupa stage occurs before and develops into the adult butterfly life stage.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that one biological life-cycle stage temporally precedes and developmentally leads into another stage within the same organism's life cycle.
remarks: Captures metamorphosis completion from pupa to adult.
Captures metamorphosis completion from pupa to adult.
Captures metamorphosis completion from pupa to adult.
Captures metamorphosis completion from pupa to adult.

cluster_relations.rel_desc: The caterpillar (larval) stage follows the egg stage as the second stage of the butterfly life cycle.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that one biological life-cycle stage temporally follows and results from another stage within the same organism's life cycle.

qualifiers.OtherQualifier: LifeCyclePosition: larval stage is stage 2, egg stage is stage 1

remarks: Complementary to the develops_into relation; included to make the temporal order explicit.
Complementary to the develops_into relation; included to make the temporal order explicit.
Complementary to the develops_into relation; included to make the temporal order explicit.
Complementary to the develops_into relation; included to make the temporal order explicit.

args.justification: All four relations connect successive stages in an organism's biological development (egg→larva→pupa→adult), not just life cycles of butterflies. Generalizing the relation class from 'life_cycle_stage_order_relation' to 'developmental_stage_order_relation' makes the schema reusable for other species and developmental contexts while preserving the TEMPORALITY group and existing canonical_rel_name values ('precedes_in_life_cycle' and 'follows_in_life_cycle').
args.remark: Only the relation class is broadened to cover developmental stage ordering in general; predicate directions and descriptions remain unchanged.

executed_decisions.justification: All four relations connect successive stages in an organism's biological development (egg→larva→pupa→adult), not just life cycles of butterflies. Generalizing the relation class from 'life_cycle_stage_order_relation' to 'developmental_stage_order_relation' makes the schema reusable for other species and developmental contexts while preserving the TEMPORALITY group and existing canonical_rel_name values ('precedes_in_life_cycle' and 'follows_in_life_cycle').
executed_decisions.remark: Only the relation class is broadened to cover developmental stage ordering in general; predicate directions and descriptions remain unchanged.
